name: 姚立德
objective:
1. Introduction to Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
2. Supervised Learning
3. Bayesian Decision Theory
4. Parametric Methods
5. Multivariate Methods
6. Dimensionality Reduction
7. Clustering
8. Decision Trees
9. Linear Discrimination
10. Kernel Machines
11. Hidden Markov Models
schedule:
1. Introduction to Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning (0.5 Wk)
2. Supervised Learning (1.5 Wk)
3. Bayesian Decision Theory (2 Wk)
4. Parametric Methods (1 Wk)
5. Multivariate Methods (2 Wk)
6. Dimensionality Reduction (3 Wk)
7. Clustering (2 Wk)
8. Decision Trees (1 Wk)
9. Linear Discrimination (1 Wk)
10. Kernel Machines (2 Wk)
11. Hidden Markov Models (2 Wk)
materials: Introduction to Machine Learning, 4th Edition, Ethem Alpaydin, MIT Press, 2020.
